settings.text: Merriam-Webster defines family as: “The basic unit in society traditionally consisting of two parents rearing their children or a group of persons with common ancestry.” The oldest dictionary publisher adds new words every year but does it alter definitions? Maybe it’s time. The idea of family feels much more layered than that.

settings.image_banner_title: A Word

settings.heading: The Sweet July Subscription Box
settings.text:
The Sweet July Box is a quarterly subscription box filled with full-sized lifestyle products hand-picked by Ayesha Curry and the Sweet July team.

Members receive four boxes a year for just $75 per season and are introduced to best-in-class beauty, skincare, health and wellness, cooking, and home decor products. They also receive member-exclusive Sweet July products.

This season’s box is full of products specifically curated to help you develop healthy habits and routines. Become a member!

settings.heading: The Magazine
settings.text:
Sweet July Magazine shares Ayesha’s unique perspective on food and entertaining, female empowerment, community and self-care through ideas and storytelling that inspire love and happiness. Sweet July spotlights those that inspire and impact their community and beyond.

Sweet July is available via Amazon, Apple News+, Zinio, the Barnes & Noble Nook, and newsstands nationwide.
settings.btn_text: Order your copy of Sweet July Magazine

settings.heading: The Village Issue
settings.text: Sweet July's first digital issue explores the gamut of our most cherished relationships and the impact of chosen family.
